short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the website you're on with a QR code!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scan to access your web pages from your phone or other device!

Need quick access to the page you're viewing on another device? This extension lets you instantly generate a QR code for the website you're viewing. Just scan it with your smartphone and find the same page again!

Save time: No more tedious copying and pasting, just one click to display the QR code.
Multi-browser compatibility: Use it on Chrome, Firefox, Edge and other WebExtensions-based browsers.
Multilingual: Available in multiple languages for seamless use, wherever you are.
100% offline: No external dependencies or calls to third-party services - everything is integrated locally.
Optimize your browsing flow and move easily from one screen to another with this fast and simple solution!
